full_text:
In the Court of the Additional Chief Judicial Magistrate,
Thiruvananthapuram
Present: Elsa Catherine George
Additional Chief Judicial Magistrate.
Dated the 4" day of March 2025
CC: 161/2025

Complainant : State represented by the Sub Inspector of Police,
Poojappura Police Station in Crime No. 97/2025
(By APP)

Accused : Al Jayendran, Malaykkal Mele Puthen Veedu, T.C 48/440,
Aaramada, Thirumala Village.

A2  Christhudas, Mullam Marivila Veedu, Aaramada,

Thirumala Village.

Offence : u/s 118(a) of Kerala Police Act.

Plea : Guilty

Finding : Guilty

Sentence/order : Accused are sentenced to pay a fine of %750/- each for
the offence u/s.118(a) of Kerala Police Act and in
default; to undergo simple imprisonment for 7 days
each.

This case having been heard today, the court passed the following:-
JUDGMENT
1. Accused Nos. 1 and 2 stand charged with the offence punishable u/s.118(a) of

Kerala Police Act.

2. Accused Nos. 1 and 2 present. Requirement u/s.207 Cr.PC was complied with and
after hearing both sides, charge was framed for the offence aforesaid, read over and
explained to the accused to which they pleaded guilty. I accept the plea since I am
convinced of its genuineness and that the same is made voluntarily. Hence, I find the
accused guilty of the offence punishable u/s.118(a) of Kerala Police Act and are
convicted thereunder. Heard on the question of sentence to which the accused
pleaded for leniency. Accordingly, the accused Nos. 1 and 2 are sentenced to pay a
fine of *750/- each for the offence u/s.118(a) of Kerala Police Act and in default; to
undergo simple imprisonment for 7 days each.

Dated this the 4" day of March 2025.
â‚¬
Elsa Catherine George,
Additional Chief Judicial Magistrate,
Thiruvananthapuram.
